website_summaries.verdict: Whip up your own sauces from kit that includes recipes, spices, 6 bottles, peppers, and labels.
pros: Create your hot sauce flavors at home with family or friends in a fast and fun way
A perfect gift for the hot sauce lover
cons: On the expensive side compared to similar kits

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: I learned so much with this kit. It comes with everything you'll need to get started from the mild to dante's inferno. I experimented with a bunch of ingredients around the house and can now make my perfect hot sauces and something similar to lizano sauce. I didn't know it was going to be this easy. Nothing about it is hard, but set aside 30 minutes to an hour and be prepared to let it cure for a couple of weeks. It's fun, it's delicious and it will add a new skill to your cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Really fun to do together
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift for my hotsauce-loving beau and it was a hit! Really fun to do together. Just a forewarning - the boiling step creates steam that may sting the eyes if yours are sensitive so I'd recommend opening a window or wearing glasses/goggles during that step. The hotsauce was delicious and even though we used all the ingredients it came with we still use the bottles, funnel & recipes because we loved them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kit that gave my boyfriend and I many hours ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent kit that gave my boyfriend and I many hours of fun. We made some awesome hot sauces from this kit, which included everything you could need to get started, and directions on how to make some basic hot sauces. It was so much fun, we are now planning on planting peppers in the spring and making this a hobby :)
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: 6 bottles of hot sauce!
customer_reviews.text: How fun is this hot sauce making kit purchased from Amazon! My 23-year old son, my 16-year old daughter and I had fun this weekend making six bottles of hot sauce. All the ingredients were included, the instructions were clearly written, and we can't wait until the sauces "cure" and we can taste them! Thank you Grow and Make!
customer_reviews.author: KVanValin

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift to do together
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to a friend as a gift and we had a great time making it. The preparation wasn’t as easy as I expected (took up a lot of space in the kitchen) and not all the ingredients you’ll need come in the box. But the packet it comes with is very informative about the flavors you’re given. We went a little off the recipes and everything turned out delicious. Looking forward to using it again!

customer_reviews.title: Unique gift!

customer_reviews.author: Heather Hoke

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend of mine who has an affinity for hot sauces. They loved it! Also... when I recently went on a trip to visit this friend, we made some hot sauce. It was fun and easy to use. We used our own gloves as the ones that come with it are those really flimsy big huge ones... like you get in the hair colour boxes. We followed the main recipe and doctored up the jerk additions to suit what we had on hand... we called it the Hawaiian Jerk Sauce hee hee. It was darn good if I do say so myself :)

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but short shelf life
customer_reviews.text: This was such a cool gift to give. My boyfriend loves making his own stuff and he also loves hot sauce, so it was perfect. The only downside is that the sauces made only last for 2-6 weeks due to not being fermented- which is fine, because the product does not say it includes pepper fermentation kits or anything. It was a really fun and exciting intro to the hot sauce world!

product_meta.title: Grow and Make Deluxe DIY Hot Sauce Making Kit - Learn How to Make 6 Spicy Sauces at Home with Chipotle, Arbol, and Guajillo Peppers
product_meta.description:
Looking for something new and different to take your homemade tacos to the next level? Learn how to make six delicious hot sauces with a DIY Deluxe Hot Sauce Making Kit from Grow and Make. Check out how all three included hot pepper varieties rank on the Scoville scale. Blend ingredients like curry, ancho, and cayenne to achieve your favorite flavor.

Mix up a batch of each of our six delicious recipes, like classic spicy Louisiana Hot Sauce and smoky Chipotle Hot Sauce. Most recipes can be easily adjusted for different heat and taste preferences. You can even try adding your favorite fresh vegetables! Complete your DIY experience by filling up six included hot sauce bottles for yourself and for friends!

A hot sauce making kit is the perfect birthday present for chefs, sriracha lovers, or the dad who has everything. Spice up someone's day with the gift of hot sauce!



Kit includes:

 * Cayenne, ancho, curry, and New Mexico chili powder
 * Granulated garlic
 * Guajillo, chipotle, and arbol peppers
 * White distilled vinegar
 * 6 glass woozy bottles with lids
 * 6 blank labels
 * Funnel
 * Gloves
 * Instruction booklet with recipes

Manufactured in a facility that also handles tree nuts, peanuts, wheat, soybeans, and corn.

Hot sauce kit made in Portland, OR, USA.
feature_bullets: 6 gourmet hot sauce recipes to make from scratch with simple instructions
6 glass woozy bottles to store your homemade hot sauces
All-natural ingredients include ancho, curry New Mexico chili powder, arbol peppers, chipotle peppers, and more!
Unique gift idea for hot sauce enthusiasts, spice-loving grill cooks, and home chefs looking for their next project!
